about_the_game:
The Goddess Lilith has conjured the magical labyrinth of Pandorea, challenging adventurers to brave its perilous zones and reach its heart, where she awaits. Those who defeat her will earn dominion over the labyrinth. As a Guild Master, you accept Lilith’s challenge, recruiting and training your party on the path to her lair.

Guild Encounters distills classic JRPG elements into a fast-paced, arcade-like experience. Players form a party of four adventurers from different classes and embark on a run through randomly selected zones, facing unpredictable encounters that culminate in a boss battle at the end of each zone.

Upon completing a run, players can spend their hard-earned Guild Points to unlock new adventurers, purchase game-altering items, and acquire ultimate weapons and accessories.

Features

Battles 

Engage in classic active turn-based battles where every fight brings new challenges! Dynamic Battle Conditions shake up combat—boosting enemies, weakening your party, inflicting status effects, and more. Adapt your strategy, overcome the odds, and conquer powerful foes!

Enhancements

Customize your strategy with powerful Enhancements! Earn Enhancement Points (EP) after each battle and equip temporary buffs to counter Battle Conditions and cover class weaknesses. Boost Max HP, strengthen attacks, and tailor your party to overcome any challenge!

Abilities

Level up and customize your party with a flexible Ability System! Allocate Ability Points to equip powerful passive skills that enhance stats, resist status effects, reduce ability costs, and more. Strategically build each hero’s strengths to adapt and overcome any challenge!

Guild Shop

Expand your ranks and gear up at the Guild Shop! Recruit new heroes, acquire rare items, and equip powerful weapons, armor, and accessories to strengthen your party for the battles ahead.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 240 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Guild Encounters is a minimalist arcade dungeon-crawling JRPG. Recruit heroes, battle through dangerous zones, and conquer challenging turn-based encounters. Earn Guild Points to unlock new allies, powerful gear, and game-changing items. Face a gauntlet of battles as you journey to the final boss!
